wiki.text:
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------> <!--
From MoS:DAB: use ONE LINK per entry, SHORT descriptions. --> <!-- AVOID: piping
links, external links, redlinks with little potential, full sentences, and
references --> <!----------------------------------------------------------------------
>


The term 'host' is most often used to describe a male (hostess in feminine form)
presenter for an event.

'Host' or 'hosts' may refer to: *A person who provides hospitality *Host or
sacramental bread *Host (biology), organism harboring another organism on or in
itself *Host (psychology), "personality" emphasized in treating dissociative
identity disorder *Host (radio), the presenter or announcer on a radio show
*Host, headwaiter (Maître d' or Maître d'hôtel) of a restaurant or hotel *Host,
Pennsylvania
wiki.title: host
